Detailed Description

Initialize the storage API and OS services layer enviroment.

Member Function Documentation

◆ init()

int storage::data::Environment::init ( const db_memory_config_t *  mem_config = NULL,
const db_config_t *  db_config = NULL,
const lm_local_config_t *  lm_local_config = NULL,
const lm_config_t *  lm_config = NULL 
)
inlinestatic

Initialize the API and OS services layer enviroment.

Parameters
mem_configMemory allocator configuration; see Environment::MemoryConfig.
db_configDatabase library configuration.
lm_local_configLocal lock manager configuration.
lm_configGeneral lock manager configuration. Takes precedent over lm_local_config if supplied.
Returns
  • DB_NOERROR when successful.
  • DB_ESTATE API and OS services layer already initialized.
  • DB_EAPIVER Version mismatch: the ITTIA DB library is incompatible with the compiled program. The application may have been linked with an old version of the library that does not support new API features. Check for this error to ensure that the correct shared library or dynamic link library (DLL) version of ITTIA DB is loaded.

Always call this function before invoking any other storage API functions.

Example usage:

::storage::data::Environment::init();
storage::data::Environment::init
static int init(const db_memory_config_t *mem_config=NULL, const db_config_t *db_config=NULL, const lm_local_config_t *lm_local_config=NULL, const lm_config_t *lm_config=NULL)
Initialize the API and OS services layer enviroment.
Definition: environment.h:581

◆ done()

int storage::data::Environment::done ( db_mem_statistics_t *  mem_statistics = NULL,
db_api_statistics_t *  api_statistics = NULL,
db_lm_statistics_t *  lm_statistics = NULL 
)
inlinestatic

Finalize the API and OS services layer.

Parameters
mem_statisticsStatistics for memory allocation with the built-in allocator. Only memory allocated internally by ITTIA DB is tracked, but the amount can vary with application behavior.
api_statisticsC API resource statistics.
lm_statisticsLock Manager Statistics
Returns
  • DB_NOERROR when successful.
Note
Call this function when the database API is no longer needed.

◆ product_version()

db_result_t storage::data::Environment::product_version ( int &  major,
int &  minor,
int &  patch,
int &  build 
)
inlinestatic

Obtain information about the library package version.

Parameters
majorMajor version number
minorMinor version number
patchPatch level number
buildbuild number
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, following error codes is set:

    • DB_INFO_ERROR Invalid database connection or not open

◆ set_trace()

void storage::data::Environment::set_trace ( const char *  trace_file,
uint32_t  enable_mask = DB_TRACE_ALL,
uint32_t  disable_mask = 0 
)
inlinestatic

Configure trace output for a quality assurance library.

This function has no effect if the application is not linked with an ITTIA DB quality assurance library (with suffix "_qa").

Parameters
trace_fileOutput file name. If the file exists, it is overwritten.
enable_maskList of trace logging facilities to enable, or 0.
disable_maskList of trace logging facilities to disable, or 0.

Masks are a bit field combination of the following logging facilities, or DB_TRACE_ALL to enable all logging facilities:

  • DB_TRACE_USERMSG
  • DB_TRACE_BUFMGR
  • DB_TRACE_LOCKMGR
  • DB_TRACE_LOGMGR
  • DB_TRACE_SPACEMGR
  • DB_TRACE_TXMGR
  • DB_TRACE_CATALOG
  • DB_TRACE_OSLIB
  • DB_TRACE_CAPI
  • DB_TRACE_DUMP
  • DB_TRACE_MEMTABLE
  • DB_TRACE_REP
  • DB_TRACE_BTREE
  • DB_TRACE_HEAP
  • DB_TRACE_DISKTABLE
  • DB_TRACE_SQL
  • DB_TRACE_IPC
  • DB_TRACE_JOURNAL

◆ get_api_statistics()

int storage::data::Environment::get_api_statistics ( db_api_statistics_t *  stats,
int  flags 
)
inlinestatic

Get Resource statistics.

Parameters
statsDestination for statistics (may be NULL).
flagsOne of:
  • DB_STATISTICS_QUERY Query statistics.
  • DB_STATISTICS_RESET Reset max value statistics after they are read into stats.
  • DB_STATISTICS_ENABLE Enable statistics collection.
  • DB_STATISTICS_DISABLE Disable statistics collection.
Returns
  • 1 when statistics are enabled prior to calling this function.
  • 0 when statistics are disabled prior to calling this function.
  • -1 on failure.

◆ get_lm_statistics()

int storage::data::Environment::get_lm_statistics ( db_lm_statistics_t *  stats,
int  flags 
)
inlinestatic

Get lock manager statistics.

Parameters
statsDestination for statistics(may be NULL).
flagsOne of:
  • DB_STATISTICS_QUERY Query statistics.
  • DB_STATISTICS_RESET Reset max value statistics after they are read into stats.
  • DB_STATISTICS_ENABLE Enable statistics collection.
  • DB_STATISTICS_DISABLE Disable statistics collection.
Returns
  • 1 when statistics are enabled prior to calling this function.
  • 0 when statistics are disabled prior to calling this function.
  • DB_ENOTIMPL when the built - in allocator is not supported.

◆ get_mem_statistics()

int storage::data::Environment::get_mem_statistics ( db_mem_statistics_t *  stats,
int  flags 
)
inlinestatic

Get built-in memory allocator statistics.

Parameters
statsDestination for statistics.
flagsOne of:
  • DB_STATISTICS_QUERY Query statistics.
  • DB_STATISTICS_RESET Reset max value statistics. Combine with
  • DB_STATISTICS_QUERY To reset after statistics are read.
Returns
  • 1 when statistics are enabled.
  • 0 when statistics are disabled.
  • DB_ESTATE when the built-in allocator is not enabled.
  • DB_ENOTIMPL when the built-in allocator is not supported.
Note
To collect memory statistics, the built-in allocator must be enabled with the DB_MEMFLAGS_TRACE flag set. Also, only QA builds of the library are capable of collecting memory statistics due to the additional overhead it introduces.

Only memory allocations performed by ITTIA DB are counted.

bool storage::data::Environment::is_error ( int  error_code)

Parameters
error_codeAn error code listed in db_error.h or os_error.h
Returns
true if the most recent failure occurred with the given error code

◆ use_lm_local()

db_result_t storage::data::Environment::use_lm_local ( const lm_local_config_t *  config)
inlinestatic

Use local lock manager and set configuration.

Parameters
configLocal lock manager configuration.
Returns
  • DB_OK When successful.

  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Configuration parameter is null.

    • DB_EINVAL Configuration parameter is null.

db_result_t storage::data::Environment::get_info_debug ( bool &  debug)
inlinestatic

Get debug support information.

Parameters
debug
  • true if product supports debug mode
  • false if product doesn't support debug
Returns
  • DB_OK When successful

  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t.

    On failure, following error codes is set:

    • DB_INFO_ERROR Invalid database connection or not open.

◆ get_info_disposition()

db_result_t storage::data::Environment::get_info_disposition ( db_flags_t &  disposition)
inlinestatic

Get Product Disposition info. Disposition: Stand-Alone or Client/Server information.

Parameters
dispositiondb library disposition, one of following:
  • DB_DISPOSITION_STANDALONE Stand-alone library embedded in process.
  • DB_DISPOSITION_IPCSOCKETS IPC over sockets.
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t.

    On failure, following error codes is set:

    • DB_INFO_ERROR Invalid database connection or not open.

◆ get_info_lock_level()

db_result_t storage::data::Environment::get_info_lock_level ( db_flags_t &  locklevel)
inlinestatic

Get lock level info.

Parameters
lockleveldb library lock level info, one of following
  • DB_LOCK_LEVEL_NONE no lock level.
  • DB_LOCK_LEVEL_ROW Row lock level.
  • DB_LOCK_LEVEL_STORAGE storage lock level.
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t.

    On failure, following error codes is set:

    • DB_INFO_ERROR Invalid database connection or not open.

◆ get_info_support()

db_result_t storage::data::Environment::get_info_support ( db_flags_t &  supported)
inlinestatic

Get db library support info.

Parameters
supportedCompiled in options. Returns integer value, a bit field combination of:
  • DB_SUPPORT_LOGGING Indicates support for recovery log.
  • DB_SUPPORT_CRYPT Indicates support for storage level encryption.
  • DB_SUPPORT_WATCHER Indicates supports for db_watch_table.
  • DB_SUPPORT_SEQUENCE Indicates support for sequence generator.
  • DB_SUPPORT_BLOB Indicates support for the BLOB type data.
  • DB_SUPPORT_SQL Indicates support for SQL queries.
  • DB_SUPPORT_TYPECVT Indicates support for field type conversion.
  • DB_SUPPORT_UNICODE Indicates support for unicode char string type.
  • DB_SUPPORT_DDL Indicates support for dynamic schema alteration.
  • DB_SUPPORT_ATOMIC_TX Indicates support for atomic transaction.
  • DB_SUPPORT_REPLICATION Indicates support for replication.
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t.

    On failure, following error codes is set:

    • DB_INFO_ERROR Invalid database connection or not open.
